div.p: This provides a list of changes to the specification since its 0.0.2 initial draft release. Please note, this IG is considered a draft specification until further notice.
2021-03-31 v0.0.6 - Published based on FHIR R4

ul.li: Clarified expected use in Guidance in first iteration is to send a FHIR Document as payload in an eHealth box message.
Made .performer optional (as per the base FHIR spec) in the Laboratory Observation profile as in theory all Observations may refer to the performer on the level of the report.

div.p: 2021-03-22 v0.0.5 - Published based on FHIR R4

ul.li: Version after feedbacks from the HL7 WG of 20210308
Expectations in guidance towards use of contained and bundle.

div.p: 2021-03-05 v0.0.4 - Published based on FHIR R4

ul.li: Version after feedbacks from the HL7 WG of 20210222
Provided multiple qualifier guidance in Guidance and via slicing in lab observation profile.
Built on feedback from HL7 community: component can be used to qualify codes.

div.p: 2020-12-03 v0.0.3 - Published based on FHIR R4

ul.li: Version after feedbacks from the HL7 WG of 20201130
Clarification around use of images in guidance.
Clarification around use of narrative in guidance.
Clarification around use of specimen in guidance.

div.p: 2020-11-16 v0.0.2 - Published based on FHIR R4

ul.li: Version after initial feedbacks from the HL7 WG.
